attributes.action: make social workers place children within family instead of fostercare
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: my 3 year old grandchild is in foster care instead of with me her nana i am disabled and have an autistic child thet say we cannot have her full time but were more than happy to let us have her at weekends do their work (supervised access) and support them but not allow us to keep her she is our family and we love her please help me to lobby parliament to encourage ministers to keep family sacred to our countrys children
